title: Introduction to Programming
description: Basic concepts of computer science and programming using Python.

title: Data Structures
description: Abstract data types, lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.

title: Operating Systems
description: Fundamental concepts of operating systems, including process management and memory.

title: Software Design Patterns
description: Advanced software design using creational, structural, and behavioral design patterns. Teaches Gang of Four (GoF) patterns, Expert, Creator, and Controller.

title: Database Systems
description: Design and implementation of relational database systems and SQL.
